title: Avoidme
author: Avoidme
created_time: November 26, 2023, 03:36:05 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 05:22:52 PM by Avoidme
content: Please stop working on this project. They are scammer.            1. Every participant should follow Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. A total of 2400$ USDT are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst all the participants. Reward will be distributed to participants BSC address after the end of campaign. I will escrow the payment after every weekend. If team did not pay weekly we will close the campaign. I do not want to take risk with hunters reward. 3. The bounty program was launched on November 28th, 20234. I will distribute the reward after the end of the campaign as soon as possible.  I will escrow the payment after every weekend. If team did not pay weekly we will close the campaign.5. Bounty manager has the right to change any rules if required.6. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC if needed.TERMS AND CONDITIONS1. Social Media Requirements:  - All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube  - All participants must join the BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.2. Telegram disqualification:  - Discussing the bounty program in the project chat group will result in immediate disqualification from the   campaign and a permanent ban from the company chat group. Please direct your bounty-related questions to   the BTT Bounty Managers's Telegram Group3. Misconduct and Violations:  - Any participant found engaging in unethical or fraudulent practices during any campaign will be disqualified.  - Participants using offensive language or participating in any form of financial misconduct will be disqualified.4. Adherence to Rules:  - Participants are required to follow the rules outlined in these campaigns. Failure to do so will result in rewards    not being granted as per the campaign's terms, and no negotiations will be entertained.5. Disqualification Consequences:  - Disqualified members will forfeit all the coins they have earned, and this action is irreversible.  - Disqualified members will not be individually notified about their disqualification. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.6. Weekly Reporting:  - All participants must submit their weekly reports for social campaigns on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis, and you are required to create new reports each week. Edited reports and proof of authentication will not be counted. Here is report format Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …Tweets URL1...2...[b]Facebook Campaign[/b]Spreadsheet No:Share Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …Posts URL1...2...[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Spreadsheet No:Posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …7. Authentication Proof:  - It is mandatory for all participants to submit proof of authentication in the campaign thread they are   participating in. Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:  BSC Wallet Address:8. Stake Updates:  - Stakes will be updated on a weekly basis.Please ensure that you read and understand these terms and conditions thoroughly before participating inthe bounty program. Violating these terms may lead to disqualification and the loss of earned rewards. Twitter              35%Facebook           20%Telegram           15%medium             10%Youtube             15%Instagram          5% Week 1 (28.11 -04.12)Week 2 ....................Week 3.....................Week 4....................Rewards:Participants will be rewarded (1-5 stakes ) based on their Tweet and Retweet quality andengagement with this tweet ( Like and Comment)Rules:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants are required to create 2 new tweets and retweet 4 tweets each week.4. There should be a minimum 24-hour gap between each retweet or tweet.5. In each retweet incorporate following hashtags: #DEXPROFIT #MINING #EARN #CRYPTO6.  In each tweet mention @dex_profit, should have coincise but valuable comment and incorporatefollowing hashtags: #DEXPROFIT #MINING #EARN #CRYPTOHow to join:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [TWITTER FORM]Rewards:Participants will be rewarded (1-5 stakes ) based on their Tweet and Retweet quality andengagement with this tweet ( Like and Comment)Rules:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Facebook accounts must have a minimum of 501 friends.3. Participants are required to create new posts or share 5 posts per week, with a maximum of 1 post per day.4. There should be a minimum 10-hour gap between each share or post.5. In each post or share, participants must include the following hashtags: #DEXPROFIT #MINING #EARN #CRYPTOHow to join:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [Facebook Form]Rewards:- Earn 5 stakes per week. Each Constructive post will get 1 stake. (Max 5 post)Rules:1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | Dex Profit."2. Replace your profile picture with the Dex Profit Logo  3. Participants may represent only one project at a time. Having multiple project names in your Telegram display name will result in disqualification from the campaign.4. Ensure that your Telegram username is visible to all while you are in the community. Interact using the same Telegram account used for campaign registration. Failure to comply will result in the forfeiture of all earned stakes.5. Contribute at least 5 constructive messages in the Telegram groups of top exchanges (e.g., Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC, etc.). Messages posted in other groups will not be counted.6. Spam or deleted messages will not be counted. Avoid using "#" hashtags in your conversations.7. Weekly, report the links to your Telegram messages. Please follow the specified reporting dates and format.8. You must remain in the Telegram group until the campaign's conclusion to receive your stakes.9. Maintain the Dex profit avatar and text throughout the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form via this link: [Telegram FORM]Rewards:- Excellent quality: 5 stakes- High quality: 4 stakes- Very Good quality: 3 stakes- Good quality: 2 stakes- Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Each participant is allowed to write a maximum of 4 original articles (1 Article every week).2. Articles must be of high quality, unique, and contain a minimum of 250 words.   - You may use official images, logos, and graphics from our website.3. Stakes will be awarded based on article quality and the level of engagement, among other criteria.4. Articles should be published on recommended blogging platforms: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn, and must be publicly accessible.5. The content of the articles should revolve around relevant topics, such as Project features, Staking/Liquidity rewards, Presale, the latest project's token updates, Blockchain, and so on.6. Only high-quality, original content will be accepted. Removal or deletion will result in disqualification.7. Published articles must include at least 2 images related to the project and provide links to Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.8. At the end of the article, please provide sufficient details about the writer to ensure authenticity. This information will be verified.9. By participating in this program, participants acknowledge that the project's team may use these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [Article Form].Rewards:- Excellent quality: 5 stakes- High quality: 4 stakes- Very Good quality: 3 stakes- Good quality: 2 stakes- Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Each participant is permitted to submit a maximum of 4 original videos (Max 1 video a week).2. Participants must have a minimum of 100+ YouTube subscribers . Videos should be a minimum of 2 minutes in length for YouTube 3. Video content must be focused on relevant topics such as project features, the latest updates on the project's token, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face-cam videos are highly recommended and will be given additional consideration, although videos without a face-cam are also accepted. Face-cam and high-quality animation videos will earn extra stakes.6. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and the overall quality of the video.7. Videos should not be removed or deleted. Removal or deletion will lead to disqualification.8. All videos must include links to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other relevant social media.9. At the end of the video, provide sufficient details about the producer (bounty hunter) to ensure authenticity. This information will be verified.How to join:1. All participants must join the Dex Profit's Twitter, Telegram,Facebook, Instagram,Medium and subscribe Youtube2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link:[Video Form] Coming Soon  Disclaimer: This bounty campaign operates without an official escrow service. I cannot provide a guarantee regarding the distribution of rewards upon the campaign's conclusion. However, I have confidence in the team's strength and communication capabilities. Therefore, I hope that rewards will be distributed as planned and in a timely manner. Participation in this bounty campaign, investment in their ICO/IDO/IEO, or utilization of their platform is at your own discretion and risk. I cannot be held responsible in the event that the developers or project team fail to meet their stated goals or obligations to bounty participants, investors, or any other stakeholders.
